title: 64 - Live At Revolution Hall
description: Live in Portland, it's a brand new My Favorite Murder! Recorded during a three-night stint at Revolution Hall, Karen and Georgia cover the terrible Bobby Jack Fowler and the mysterious Cline Falls Hatchet Attack.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
